meta_title: What is Calibration? Definition, Importance & Standards
meta_description: Define calibrate: The process of comparing an instrument against a standard to ensure accuracy. Understand metrology, traceability, and compliance for industry.
title: Calibration Definition
image_prompt: A high-resolution, photo-realistic image of a professional technician in a modern industrial setting wearing a lab coat and safety glasses. The technician is carefully calibrating a digital pressure gauge using a high-precision master calibrator. The background features a clean, organized metrology lab with digital displays showing data graphs and various precision measurement tools. The lighting is bright and clinical, emphasizing accuracy and technical expertise.
